name: peapod
description: Unofficial PeaPod Native App for Windows, macOS and Linux platforms

scripts.build: yarn run build:macos && yarn run build:linux && yarn run build:windows
scripts.build:macos: electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --out=dist --ignore='^media$' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=static/Icon.icns --app-bundle-id=com.xinjiangshao.peapod --sign='Developer ID Application: Xinjiang Shao (63YV2X6Y4E)' && cd dist/PeaPod-darwin-x64 && zip -ryXq9 ../PeaPod-osx-${npm_package_version}.zip PeaPod.app

author: Xinjiang Shao <shaoxinjiang@gmail.com>
